A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Gotta be honest\, I felt like the entire goal of this movie was to constantly set up expectations\, then twist and undermine them for the sole purpose of keeping the audience uncomfortable. Like the director wanted this to not feel like a Star Wars film. In that\, he was successful. The hope\, the action\, the character dynamics- it was all missing. A good movie\, I suppose\, but not a Star Wars movie.
